name: Lx7.ca Web Ring
description: Trusted nodes in the relational web. Fork this and build your own.
author: Nigil Caenaan

nodes.name: Humanjava Enterprises
nodes.description: Essays on AI, creativity, and the shift from materialism to relationalism
nodes.why: Origin point. Where the ideas get refined into artifacts.

nodes.name: Nigil Caenaan Bandcamp
nodes.description: The finished musical artifacts. Where the sound lives.
nodes.why: The output. Performance artifacts that emerged from the relational process.

nodes.name: Vveerrgg Online
nodes.description: Vveerrgg's link site. All the places to find the work.
nodes.why: Central hub. The directory for everything Vveerrgg.

nodes.name: Simon Willison's Weblog
nodes.description: Thoughtful writing on AI, LLMs, and open web principles. Building tools like Datasette and LLM CLI.
nodes.why: Aligned voice. Data as artifact, tools for thought, open web advocacy.

nodes.name: Maggie Appleton
nodes.description: Visual essays on digital gardening, tools for thought, and the relational web.
nodes.why: Process over product. Digital gardens vs performance blogs. Relational thinking.

nodes.name: Are.na
nodes.description: Platform for collecting and connecting ideas. Anti-algorithm, pro-curation.
nodes.why: Sovereignty over convenience. Built for relational thinking and curation.

nodes.name: Hundred Rabbits
nodes.description: Nomadic artists/developers building resilient, offline-first tools. Permacomputing philosophy.
nodes.why: Anti-fragility. Sovereignty. Building for resilience and longevity.

nodes.name: Kicks Condor
nodes.description: Indie web advocate. Builds personal web tools, champions the small web.
nodes.why: Web rings. Relational web. The indie web spirit alive and well.
